We enjoyed this gem off season.  A friend recommended it and we were so happy to try it on our visit.  Fresh seafood sprawled out, market style.  Ask what is freshest...we had the tuna, calamari & razor clams.  They cut it in front of you and send it to the kitchen to be cooked.  You can order soup or salad to accompany the seafood.  They have bread and a selection of sauces.  Order your beverage of choice and then have a seat.  Your number will be called a few times, as the times vary on the items to be cooked.  We found the order to be perfect, as we had time to enjoy each dish hot.  Simple yet great food!  If you are looking for seafood, we highly recommend finding this place.
